snippet.title: What if you hear a cat purr but there is no cat
snippet.description: If you hear what sounds like cat purring or rushing water...you may want to consult a nuerologist

snippet.title: Why does your cat not purr
snippet.description: your cat does not purr because it is not happy

snippet.title: Do cats purr to other cats
snippet.description: with another cat, what will it do? - hiss and snarl. It can purr for affection to another cat.

snippet.title: Why and how do cats purr?
snippet.description: Experts cannot agree on how or why cats purr, or on where the sound originates. Some think

snippet.title: What do cats do to purr
snippet.description: , if you scratch them under the chin, they will like it and will start to purr.

snippet.title: Do cats have to purr
snippet.description: No. Some cats go their whole lives without purring. Purring lets you know the cat is either happy

snippet.title: How do cat's purr
snippet.description: I believe that cats purr from their throat. Well cats have special wiring in their throats

snippet.title: Do cats purr when in pain
snippet.description: Yes, many cats do purr when in pain. However, some may not.
